attributes.action: young people under 16 should be allowed in a company vehical to work
attributes.additional_details: I want the goverment to say that a the law to be lifted for under 16s to be able to work in a company vehical im under 16 where my dad works the owner of the business say that i can work but i am unable to work because of the law of young people under 16 are not allowed in a company vehical doesnt this go against everything about the government wanting to get young people too work i can do the job i would be with my dad but yet one thing is stopping me and it has been but there by the government but yet they are still trying to get young people too work.
